name: part_006
file: tmp_Yozora Mel stream (Oct 31, 2022)【ホロライブ ⧸ 3DLIVE】ハロウィンのお姫様  Halloween Princess 【#夜空メル爆誕2022】 [WbNkG3kbOHo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Instrumental transition and intro for the next song featuring Hakui Koyori.
Yozora Mel and guest Hakui Koyori perform 'Ghost Rule'.

subtitles.original: ちょっと待った 知らぬ間に独りぼっち
subtitles.english: Wait a second, before I knew it, I was all alone

subtitles.original: 明日の予定も 知らない言葉
subtitles.english: Tomorrow's plans, words I don't know

subtitles.original: そりゃデタラメな 汚れ下げは解けていく
subtitles.english: Well, that nonsensical, messy ending is dissolving

subtitles.original: 僕はなんなんだろうね
subtitles.english: I wonder what I am

subtitles.original: ねえどうか 存在を返して
subtitles.english: Hey, please, give me back my existence

subtitles.original: あいにく様だが こっちはこっちで
subtitles.english: Pardon me, but over here, on this side

subtitles.original: 随分居心地が良くて
subtitles.english: It's been quite comfortable

subtitles.original: もうあなたの居場所は ここには前と
subtitles.english: There's no longer a place for you here

subtitles.original: わかってるんでしょ
subtitles.english: You know that, don't you?

subtitles.original: ねえバレたんなら 奪えばいいだろ
subtitles.english: Hey, if I'm found out, I should just take it over

subtitles.original: 今度は僕の番だ
subtitles.english: This time, it's my turn

subtitles.original: 含み笑いで 威張るな
subtitles.english: Don't act so high and mighty with that smirk

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー 君は君は誰？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who are you, who are you?

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 混沌と交差して
subtitles.english: Ah, intersecting with chaos

subtitles.original: 僕は誰？
subtitles.english: Who am I?

subtitles.original: さあ 狂騒と踊れば
subtitles.english: Now, if we dance with the frenzy

subtitles.original: 命の椅子は一つだけ
subtitles.english: There's only one seat for life

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー 誰は君と僕を裂いた
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who tore you and me apart?

subtitles.original: 一滴 渇き混ぜる前に
subtitles.english: Before a single drop of thirst mixes in

subtitles.original: 何でもいい 何でもいい
subtitles.english: Anything's fine, anything's fine

subtitles.original: 器をください
subtitles.english: Give me a vessel

subtitles.original: 狂った正解が染め上げてる アンバッバ
subtitles.english: The twisted truth is dyeing it all, An-ba-ba

subtitles.original: それはずっと続く 人の子の連鎖
subtitles.english: That is the chain of children of men that continues forever

subtitles.original: 委ね合って 許し合って 満たされ往く
subtitles.english: Entrusting each other, forgiving each other, becoming fulfilled

subtitles.original: 欠けたピース 価値のペイン 渇望した愛も
subtitles.english: The missing piece, the pain of value, even the craved love

subtitles.original: 託し合って 生まれ変わる イニシエーション
subtitles.english: Entrusting to each other, a reborn initiation

subtitles.original: 僕の頬を ちゃんと君は射てるから
subtitles.english: Since you're properly aiming at my cheek

subtitles.original: 君も次の誰か ちゃんと救わなくちゃ
subtitles.english: You must properly save the next someone too

subtitles.original: もうわかってんだろ 何をすればいいかさ
subtitles.english: You already know what you should do, right?

subtitles.original: どうか誰か僕に 奇跡をくれよ
subtitles.english: Please, someone, give me a miracle

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー 君は君は誰？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who are you, who are you?

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 混沌と交差して 僕は誰？
subtitles.english: Ah, intersecting with chaos, who am I?

subtitles.original: もう止まらない 戻れない
subtitles.english: Can't stop anymore, can't go back

subtitles.original: どうもこんにちは 君の分身です
subtitles.english: Hello there, I am your alter ego

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger

subtitles.original: それはそれは僕を 縛り出した存在
subtitles.english: That, that is the existence that tied me down

subtitles.original: 世界がいつか 鳴り止まないならば
subtitles.english: If the world one day never stops ringing

subtitles.original: 奇跡の輪廻が 狂った世界を
subtitles.english: If the cycle of miracles dyes the twisted world

subtitles.original: 染め上げるさ アンバッバ アンバッバ
subtitles.english: It will dye it all, An-ba-ba An-ba-ba

subtitles.original: 「どうもこんにちは 君の分身です」
subtitles.english: “Hello there, I am your alter ego”

subtitles.original: ゴーストルール
subtitles.english: Ghost Rule

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：DECO*27
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: DECO*27

subtitles.original: どうだっていいことを 嘘吐いて吐いて 戻れない
subtitles.english: Lying and lying about things that don't matter, I can't go back

subtitles.original: 時効なんてやってこない 奪ったように奪われて
subtitles.english: The statute of limitations never comes, being stolen from just as I stole

subtitles.original: 今日だって叶わない 思ったように騙せない
subtitles.english: Even today it doesn't come true, I can't deceive as I thought

subtitles.original: 腐っている僕には 腐ったものがわからない
subtitles.english: For someone as rotten as me, I don't understand rotten things

subtitles.original: おいで
subtitles.english: Come here

subtitles.original: ここまで
subtitles.english: This far

subtitles.original: いぇー
subtitles.english: Yeah

subtitles.original: 隠してしまったんだ
subtitles.english: I ended up hiding it

subtitles.original: メーデー 僕とわかっても
subtitles.english: Mayday, even if you know it's me

subtitles.original: もう抱きしめなくていいんだよ
subtitles.english: You don't have to hug me anymore

subtitles.original: メーデー 僕がわかったら
subtitles.english: Mayday, if you understand it's me

subtitles.original: もう一度笑ってくれるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you'll smile for me once more

subtitles.original: マボロシだって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: Knowing it's just a phantom

subtitles.original: 嘘憑きだって知るんだよ ねえ
subtitles.english: Knowing I'm a liar too, hey

subtitles.original: どうだっていいはずが 居取ってイエスを絞り出す
subtitles.english: It should be fine either way, but I take a seat and squeeze out a 'yes'

subtitles.original: 後悔の静寂は 騙した方が正義なの
subtitles.english: In the silence of regret, is the one who deceives the righteous one?

subtitles.original: 卑怯だって構わない 祈っておいてそれはない
subtitles.english: I don't care if it's cowardly, you can't say that after praying

subtitles.original: 飾っていた饒舌が 墓穴を掘ってえらい様
subtitles.english: The eloquence I decorated with dug its own grave; what a fine mess

subtitles.original: おいで
subtitles.english: Come here

subtitles.original: どこまで
subtitles.english: How far?

subtitles.original: いぇー
subtitles.english: Yeah

subtitles.original: 被害者面したって
subtitles.english: Even if you act like the victim

subtitles.original: メーデー 僕を暴いてよ
subtitles.english: Mayday, expose me

subtitles.original: 正直者な夢見たいなら
subtitles.english: If you want to see a dreamer who is honest

subtitles.original: メーデー 僕を裁いてよ
subtitles.english: Mayday, judge me

subtitles.original: 最後まで甘え尽かすのは
subtitles.english: To rely on someone to the very end is...

subtitles.original: 亡霊だって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: Knowing it's just a ghost

subtitles.original: 空白だって知るんだよ ねえ
subtitles.english: Knowing it's just a void, hey

subtitles.original: 足りないものを望んだら 僕じゃない僕になった
subtitles.english: If I desire what is missing, I become someone who isn't me
